The star continued to receive small roles throughout the 1990s, and by 2001 the Spanish-speaking actress and singer had already scooped some great accolades, such as the ALMA Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Syndicated Drama Series for the wonderful portrayal of Helen in Cleopatra 2525 . She then played Jasmine in the film Angel and was nominated for the International Press Academy’s Golden Satellite Award for Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role in a Series.

Three years later, the Cuban-American actress won with her roles in Herzen Soccer Moms, Matrix Revolutions and Matrix Reloaded .

She got another chance to prove herself once more in the third season of 24 and her role as Julia Milliken on the series, which also did well, allowed her to unleash her enviable talents as Zoe on the TV series Firefly . Although the show only lasted for a brief moment, fans were able to enjoy her presence as she reprized the role of Zoe in the 2005 sci-fi drama Serenity. Subsequently, Torres appeared in numerous projects that prospered like I Think I Love My Husband, the Fang, the Castle, Suits, and many others.

Torres has also been involved in other engagements, such as voicing some episodes of the Justice League Unlimited animated series for the character of Vixen. She also voiced The Matrix Online as the character Niobe , formerly voiced by Jada Pinkett Smith.

Her husband and daughter

Gina Torres is probably an eligible Virgo for her. That doesn’t mean she was single all the time, though. While her career seems perfect and successful, the same cannot be said for her love life. The actress found love in Matrix Reloaded co-star Laurence Fishburne, who was born in 1961. They began dating in 2001 and married in 2002, but their 14-year marriage broke up in 2017 in what the actress describes as an amicable split. They have a daughter named Delilah and they both share the responsibilities of raising her.

Fishburne, who has two adult children (a son and daughter, born 1987 and 1991 respectively) from a previous romance with fellow film star Hajna O. Moss, fell in love with Torres. The duo worked on a variety of projects such as Matrix. The 1.84 m tall actor is known to have started acting in 1971, but his career received a huge boost when he starred with Gina Torres in The Matrix . He has currently received numerous awards and nominations from various respected awarding bodies such as Emmy, NAACP, Saturn and Oscar.

Although no one is sure who Gina Torres is dating, reports now reveal that the stunning actress moved on even before their harmonious breakup became official. Once she was spotted sharing some romantic moments with an unknown man. Despite this, she has tried to keep things a secret since their divorce.
